articles.title: Embracing a quieter life, Tim Thomas reflects on his tenure with the Burins
articles.description:
"It's easy for me to just forget who I was before, so sometimes stuff like this reminds me of what I have done in the past and what I've accomplished."

The post Embracing a quieter life, Tim Thomas reflects on his tenure with the Burins appeared first on Boston.com.
